name: 检(檢)疫 (Quarantined )
description:
The story of a young American woman caught up in the Coronavirus chaos in Wuhan, China.  Inspired by real accounts from citizen journalists on the ground.

Credits:

Opening theme:  "It Is Lost" by Kevin MacLeod

This song is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100190
Artist: http://incompetech.com/

Closing theme:  "Heaven and Hell" by Jeremy Blake
